Title: Active Users by Blockchain
Description: The number of unique addresses that were active as a sender of a successful transactions.

Title: Blocks by Blockchain
Description: The total number of blocks created.

Title: Total Transaction Fees by Blockchain [USD]
Description: The total amount of fees in U.S. dollars paid to conduct transactions.

Title: Transactions by Blockchain
Description: The total number of transactions whether it has been successful or not.
